On Mar 9, 2005, at 7:22 PM, Matt Coleman wrote:
for i in `find /home/photos`; do convert -geometry \>150x\>150 $i `echo 
$i | sed 's/.jpg//i'`_thumb.jpg;done


Is 'convert' your own creation, or is it like a utility to bsh?


"convert" is part of the ImageMagick suite.

http://www.imagemagick.org/
